title: Mark's levels
content: I would like to ask again: how are the levels of Mark (Candyjunk)

title: Re: Mark's levels
content:
Oh man.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
I'll have to answer once again that he has quit working on them, or at least there hasn't been any news for months (or years)..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
